data.title: BC Ferries Vacations
data.meta_description: Get details and book an activity for your next coastal BC getaway with BC Ferries Vacations.
data.text:
Leave your vehicle behind, relax and let someone else take care of the driving. With BC Ferries Connector, you can unwind and enjoy the convenient and dependable daily year-round scheduled luxury shuttle service.

The BC Ferries Connector lets you sit back and enjoy the ride from the Vancouver Cruise Ship Terminal to Victoria, and take in the spectacular journey across the Georgia Strait without ever having to worry about parking.

Location: 999 Canada Place, Vancouver, BC.

As passenger leaves the cruise ship, go through customs and check-in with agent holding 'BC Ferries Connector Bus to Victoria: DO NOT walk out onto the bus area without checking in. Present your printed voucher to the driver when boarding the bus as proof of payment.

Check-in by 8:25 AM at the Cruise Ship level located at 999 Canada Place. The BC Ferries Connector will be waiting at one of the bus bays, and will depart at 8:55 AM.

You will arrive at approximately 1:20 PM in downtown Victoria at the Capital City Station at 721 Douglas Street (located behind the Fairmont Empress).

IMPORTANT: Please ensure your disembarkation priority will provide enough time to meet this departure time of 8:55 AM. Give yourself at least 45 minutes to 1 hour for disembarkation of cruise ship and collection of your luggage to meet the bus on time.
